questions.question: Which of the following is a synonym for 'abundant'?
Choose the correct form of the verb: She _____ to the store yesterday.
What type of literary device is used in the phrase 'time flies'?
Which of these sentences is grammatically incorrect?
options: Each of the students have a different opinion.
The dog quickly ran across the field.

questions.question: Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
What is the plural form of 'child'?
What does the acronym 'UNESCO' stand for?
options: United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization
United Nations Environment and Social Council
United Nations Economic and Social Organization
United Nations Educational and Social Cooperation
questions.answer: United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization

questions.question: Who is the protagonist in William Shakespeare's play 'Hamlet'?
What literary term is defined as 'a figure of speech in which a part is made to represent the whole or vice versa'?
Which word is a conjunction?
Who wrote 'Pride and Prejudice'?
Which of these sentences uses the correct past tense of 'begin'?
options: She begun to study for her exam.
He has began to paint the fence.
The movie have begun just now.
They began their journey early in the morning.
questions.answer: They began their journey early in the morning.

questions.question: What is the meaning of the idiom 'barking up the wrong tree'?
options: To climb a tree to escape danger
To waste time on unproductive efforts
questions.answer: To waste time on unproductive efforts

questions.question: Which of these words is an adverb?
What is the opposite of 'brave'?
Who wrote the novel '1984'?
Which of these sentences uses 'their' correctly?
options: Their going to the store later.
Their going to the park last weekend.
They're going to the concert tonight.
There going to the movies tomorrow.
questions.answer: They're going to the concert tonight.

questions.question: What literary device is used in the sentence 'The stars danced playfully in the moonlit sky'?
